name: karma-oojspec-test
description: A Karma plugin - adapter for oojspec testing framework.
author: Frederico Schardong <frede.sch@gmail.com>

scripts.prepare: rm -rf node_modules/{karma,karma-oojspec} && git clone https://github.com/karma-runner/karma.git && cd karma && npm install && npm run init && npm run build && cd .. && git clone https://github.com/rosenfeld/karma-oojspec.git && cd karma-oojspec && npm install
